alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 30 at 3:21AM MST until December 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SATURDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches from 7000 to 7500 feet with 6 to 12 inches above 7500 feet. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph on Friday. * WHERE...Areas above 7000 feet near Buffalo Pass, Ganado and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Saturday. The period of heaviest snow is expected this morning and once again Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Hazardous travel conditions will impact morning and evening commutes. Additional snow forecast from 2 AM Today to 5 AM Saturday: Buffalo Pass 7 to 11 inches Ganado 2 to 4 inches Window Rock 2 to 4 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
